faqs.q: What are examples of recipes high in calories?
faqs.a: Try cheesy lasagna, loaded nachos, or peanut butter banana smoothies for 700+ kcal per serving.

faqs.q: How can I make recipes high in calories?
faqs.a: Incorporate calorie-dense ingredients like oils, cheeses, nuts, and creams while balancing nutrients.

faqs.q: Are recipes high in calories good for weight gain?
faqs.a: Yes, they help increase calorie intake for muscle building or recovery, but pair with exercise.

faqs.q: What nutrients are in recipes high in calories?
faqs.a: Typically high in carbs, fats, and proteins; a sample serving has ~95g carbs, 42g fat, 28g protein.

faqs.q: Can recipes high in calories be healthy?
faqs.a: Absolutely—use whole foods like avocados, olive oil, and lean meats to add calories without excess junk.
